column2: "I knew that navigating subspace came with all kinds of trouble, but I never thought it'd spit us out into a completely unknown world."
"Everything was absolutely perfect during the experiment and verification stages. Where did we go wrong?"
"But we had great luck, didn't we? ARKS came to the rescue, and we're getting all kinds of help!"
"\"Why, because I wanted to go to the end of subspace!\" would be a little too loose an explanation, I guess?"
"Hmm, yeah... I'd be lying if I said it wasn't scary, but we had an objective in mind, y'know?"
"At the end of subspace, there's someone who I want to meet. Someone who helped me."
"I want to meet that person one more time. That's the only reason. Simple enough, right?"
"Although I've got no clue what I'll actually do when I meet them, or after I meet them..."
"Yeah... I'm kind of feeling like all this trouble, the accident, is that person's way of telling me to take a break."
"But I'm not one for staying still and thinking things through, over and over. Nope..."
"...That's right! I've got to pick myself up, and get back out there into subspace pronto! I'm gonna go meet 'em!"
"That would be the most like me! So that's the plan, let's get to it!"
